projects.title: Door Sign
projects.description: A sign for my bedroom door that shows what's currently happening in my calendar, based off a Spark Core.
projects.long_description: A sign for my bedroom door that shows what's currently happening in my calendar, based off a Spark Core and a £5 display from eBay. I also wrote a blog post about why I made it and how I use it.

projects.title: Bergcloud API Gem
projects.description: When BERG released their new cloud API, I couldn't wait to start using it in Wake, a project that'll be released soon-ish. It was a pain to make requests manually, however, so I wrote a gem for it.

projects.title: Little Printer Publications
projects.description: I joined went to BERG's Little Printer hackday and After School Clubs, and developed several publications for it, one of which was the most popualr on the platform. • No Context • Little Commits • Firefly Learning • On This Day

projects.title: Firefly Map System
projects.description: I worked with Firefly on an internal project to create a system that allowed their team to create dynamic maps of specific subsets of their clients, using the Google Maps API and Highrise HQ API. Useful for planning trips to their schools and giving a visual overview of their clients.

projects.title: Outdoor Advertising Directory
projects.description: I developed the back end and designed the front end of The Outdoor Advertising Directory, a database of real adverts with a payment system powered by Stripe.
